actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Uniform Relocation Assistance and Real Property Acquisition Policies Act of 1970 to provide that a person who gives or donates real property for a program or project to which such Act applies may waive the right to an appraisal of such property.

summary.text: Amends the Uniform Relocation Assistance and Real Property Acquisition Policies Act of 1970 to provide that a person donating real property to the Government may waive the right to an appraisal of such property.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Uniform Relocation Assistance and Real Property Acquisition Policies Act of 1970 to provide that a person who gives or donates real property for a program or project to which such Act applies may waive the right to an appraisal of such property.
